name: 2 - Create external tables in Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools

folder.name: Create metadata objects in Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools

content.query:
--Create an external table on protected data
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE populationExternalTable 
( 
    [country_code] VARCHAR (5) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, 
    [country_name] VARCHAR (100) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, 
    [year] smallint, 
    [population] bigint 
) 
WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'csv/population/population.csv', 
    DATA_SOURCE = sqlondemanddemo, 
    FILE_FORMAT = QuotedCSVWithHeaderFormat 
); 


--Create an external table on public data
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Taxi ( 
    vendor_id VARCHAR(100) ,
    pickup_datetime DATETIME2,  
    dropoff_datetime DATETIME2, 
    passenger_count INT, 
    trip_distance FLOAT, 
    fare_amount FLOAT, 
    tip_amount FLOAT, 
    tolls_amount FLOAT, 
    total_amount FLOAT 
) WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.parquet', 
        DATA_SOURCE = YellowTaxi, 
        FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat 
);

SELECT country_name, population 
FROM populationExternalTable 
WHERE [year] = 2020 
ORDER BY [population] DESC;

SELECT TOP 50 * FROM Taxi
